title: Cannon connect 9/16/2014
body: I dont understand what is going on but i cannot connect to the game... I would make it to the login screen but it wont let me actually log into the actual game. Any else have the same problem?{{champion:254}}

replies.body: Happened to me at first, but when I tried again it let me log in. I figured it was just because I was playing on a different computer than usual, until I looked in the forum.

@Jack5124 daym thats so long... 

Only reason why i want to get on now is cuz i want to check out the new champ in play... I hope they fix this soon.{{summoner:6}}
Its been like that for a couple days too for me  as well
Yes, I and a few other people on these forums are having the same problem. Some others said it got fixed randomly after a while, but after 3 hours, mine still isn't working.
Its been like this for me, for the past two days
